document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">from </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">Earth </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">light </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">Balloon </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">Asks </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">nothing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f084ff">release </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">Ascension </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">which </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">soaring, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">Residence. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">spirit </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">looks </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">upon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Dust </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">fastened </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">long </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">With </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">indignation, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Bird </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">Defrauded </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">Song. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: As from the earth the light balloon
